main_definition: A young human being in the earliest stage of development, especially one newly born; or informally referring to a person in general as endearing or youthful.

meanings_and_examples.example: She called her boyfriend 'baby' after he surprised her with flowers.
The couple welcomed a baby girl into the world last month.
He bought a beautiful, tiny flower to keep in his pocket as a 'baby' souvenir from their trip.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A new computer or device at the beginning of its use
meanings_and_examples.example: 'I just got this baby phone; it feels like I'm holding my first one!
